alert.note: Alert for Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 1:36PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade and south central Broward Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 135 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, or 10 miles southwest of Miramar, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds possible and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Miami Gardens, Weston, Doral, Miami Lakes, Hialeah Gardens, Opa-Locka, Medley, Palm Springs North, Country Club, Pennsuco, Hard Rock Stadium, Intersection Krome And U.S. 27 and Saint Thomas University. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
